title: Philly 20000mAh Power Charging Bank
details:
Advanced intelligent chips and high-quality lithium polymer batteries are adopted to provide durable and reliable battery life for mobile phones, tablets, digital cameras and other equipment.

Advanced intelligent chips can effectively improve the conversion rate, provide nine-fold circuit protection, and comprehensively improve the charge and discharge efficiency.Built-in safeguards protect your devices against excessive current, overheating, and overcharging.

You can easily slip it into any of your pockets or bags. 20000mAh of power charges most phones over 5 times, tablets at least 3 times and any other USB device multiple times.

Dual Output & Input: Each has 2 USB output ports that detect all the connected devices and efficiently distributes the current output up to 5V 2.1A.

The USB C and Micro USB ports can fully refill the battery itself in 10 hrs at 5V 2.0A.

Suitable for charging most of digital devices, such as smartphones, tablets and other USB-powered devices.

Dual charging port with Fast-Charging technology charges two devices at the same time - without sacrificing charging speed.

Surge protection, short circuit prevention and more advanced safety features keep you and your devices safe.

Reliable Li-polymer Cell: Thanks to the Li-polymer battery pack, the charger is much safer than any Li-ion charger. Also, it's lighter and slimmer that you can easily carry it around, even on airplanes

In today's fast-paced world, staying connected is essential, and a reliable power charging bank ensures you never miss a moment. Imagine being out and about, capturing memories or navigating through your day, only to be hindered by a dying phone.

With our high-capacity power charging banks available on Jumia, you can effortlessly keep your devices charged and ready for action. Designed for portability and efficiency, these power banks are equipped with fast-charging technology, allowing you to power up in no time. Don't let low battery anxiety hold you back – empower your digital lifestyle today!
specifications:
Product Name: PL-203 Charging Bank (20,000mah)
Specification size: 137*69*28mm
Product weight: 485g
Input port: Micro USB+Type-C
Output port: 2 USB-A

title: EasyPie 20000mAh Dual Fast Charge 64W Type-C And Micro-USB Portable Power Bank
details:
Product details
EasyPie Selection 20000mAh Portable Fast Charger
【64W High-Speed Charging】
Advanced fast-charging technology，iPhone 12Pro delivers 56% power in just 40 minutes, 1.2x faster than standard chargers. Dual USB ports provide stable 2.1A output for simultaneous charging of two devices. Intelligent circuit management ensures efficient and safe charging without damaging your devices.
【Compact & Portable】
With compact dimensions (137×67.9×27.6mm), it easily fits in pockets or bags. The 20000mAh high capacity meets long-distance travel needs. FAA-certified for air travel, it's approved for airplanes, high-speed rails, and subways - your perfect power companion on the go.
【Multi-Device Compatibility】
Universal compatibility: Charges iPhone X ≈5 times, iPhone 11 Pro ≈4 times, Huawei Mate30 ≈3 times. Features four ports (Type-C input, Micro USB input, dual USB outputs) to accommodate various devices. Supports mixed charging of new and old generation smartphones.
【Absolute Safety Assurance】
Premium lithium-polymer battery with quadruple protection (over-voltage/current/short-circuit/temperature). Equipped with LED power indicators and physical safety switch for real-time monitoring. Fire-resistant casing passes rigorous safety tests, guaranteeing worry-free usage.
specifications:
General Specification:
Brand: EasyPie Selection
Model: EZ-S Fortis 20
Capacity: 20000mAh /3.7V（64Wh）
Input 1: Micro USB DC5V---2.1A（max)
Input 2: Type-C DC5V---2.1A（max)
Output 1: DC5V---2.1A(max)
Output 2: DC5V---2.1A(max)
Dimensions: 137×67.9×27.6 mm
Weight：≈0.4KG
Color:Black

title: my-tell Feature Phone Dual Sim, Camera, Bluetooth, Wireless FM, Mp3
details:
Compact & Reliable Dual SIM Feature Phone – Stay Connected Anytime, Anywhere
This dual SIM feature phone is designed for simplicity, durability, and efficiency. Whether you need a reliable backup phone, a device for work, or a travel companion, this compact phone is packed with essential features to keep you connected.
✅ Dual SIM Support – Easily switch between two numbers, perfect for work and personal use without needing two phones.
✅ Clear Camera – Capture quick moments with the built-in camera, ideal for simple snapshots and sharing with friends.
✅ Bluetooth Connectivity – Wirelessly transfer files, connect with Bluetooth headsets, and enjoy hands-free convenience.
✅ Wireless FM Radio – Listen to your favorite radio stations anytime, anywhere—no need for earphones or internet connection.
✅ MP3 Music Player – Store and play your favorite songs with MP3 support, turning your phone into a mini music device.
✅ Torch Light – Equipped with a bright flashlight, perfect for emergencies, outdoor use, or nighttime visibility.
✅ 1.77-inch Display – A clear, compact screen that offers an easy-to-read interface and smooth navigation.
✅ 800mAh Battery – Long-lasting battery life ensures hours of talk time and standby, reducing the need for frequent charging.
This dual SIM feature phone is designed for simplicity, durability, and efficiency. Whether you need a reliable backup phone, a device for work, or a travel companion, this compact phone is packed with essential features to keep you connected.
specifications:
Dual SIM & Essential Connectivity – Easily manage two numbers for work and personal use, with Bluetooth for file transfers and hands-free calls.
Multimedia & Entertainment – Built-in camera for quick snapshots, MP3 player for music, and Wireless FM radio for on-the-go entertainment.
Long-Lasting Battery – The 800mAh battery provides extended talk time and standby, reducing the need for frequent charging
Practical Features – A bright torch light for emergencies and a 1.77-inch display for easy navigation and readability.
Compact & Durable Design – Lightweight, sturdy, and user-friendly, making it an ideal backup phone for seniors, kids, or travelers.

title: Wireless Body Induction Lamp LED Motion Sensor Night Light
details:
Advanced Light & Motion Sensor
Equipped with a long-distance motion sensor, it detects movement from 3-5 meters away within a 120° range. The light activates only when it's dark enough and motion is detected, conserving energy.
 Dual Modes for Flexibility
Choose between AUTO mode, which automatically turns on when motion is detected and off after 20 seconds of inactivity, or ON mode for continuous lighting. The convenient switch allows you to turn it off when not needed.
 Energy-Efficient with Long Battery Life
Built-in rechargeable 400mAh lithium polymer battery offers 10+ hours of continuous use in ON mode or months of use in AUTO mode (supports over 1500 sensor activations, with 20 seconds per activation).
 Soft, Eye-Caring Light
The LED light provides a bright yet soft illumination that is flicker-free and non-dazzling, protecting your eyes from strain while offering clear visibility in dark spaces.
 Easy, Wireless Installation
Install effortlessly using the built-in magnet, adhesive strip, or keyhole mounting options. No wiring required – simply stick it to any iron surface or attach it via the magnetic plate for ultimate convenience.
 Specific Uses
Ideal for indoor spaces like closets, pantries, under cabinets, counters, safes, lockers, shelves, or stairs, providing effective lighting wherever it's needed.
specifications:
Battery Capacity: 400mAh
Light Color: Warm White
Charging Method: USB Rechargeable
Sensing Range: 3-5m distance, 120° angle
Modes: AUTO, ON, OFF
Continuous Use: 10+ hours (ON mode); up to months in AUTO mode (1500+ activations at 20 seconds each)
Light Design: Flicker-free, soft, and non-dazzling for eye comfort
Installation Methods:
Attach directly to any iron surface
Mount using the magnetic plate
Hang via the keyhole slot on the back
Size: Diameter 8.5 cm
